author: PlayStation
description:
Death came to collect Mad Maggie’s soul, and she laughed in its face. Now the armies of the undead are battling in the Raise Hell Event for the one soul that refuses to be harvested.

Wildcard gets a full Halloween takeover: choose Reaper or Demon Wild Cards to gain mastery of the dark arts, hunt your enemies with Rev Shell Grenades, and watch out for the haunted loot bins. Plus, there's an opportunity to get new Legendary skins and Mad Maggie's Prestige skin—complete with dive trail and finisher—crafted for the one Legend hell itself couldn't contain.

Time to kick those supernatural assassins back to hell.

Apex Legends™ is a free-to-play* battle royale game where legendary characters battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Play for free now on PlayStation® 4, PlayStation 5.

Credits:
Production Company: Electronic Arts & Dark Burn Creative
Sound Design and Mix: Respawn Entertainment & Mass Audio
All other categories: Electronic Arts & Respawn Entertainme
title: Apex Legends - Raise Hell Event Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011541

📅 Time’s running out. Can you host the ultimate football event experience?
Wishlist now to #HostYourFootball:
PlayStation → https://cutt.ly/copacity_psstore
In Copa City, time isn’t just your rival. It’s rather a true antagonist of your story.
You’ve got 14 days to gather the fans, prepare the city, and make the match happen. Every decision matters, every second counts.
Watch as supporting fans flood the streets, flares light the skyline, and your advisors: Kat and Ravi guide you through the toughest countdown of your career.
Will you fill the stadium before the clock hits zero?
Copa City is a football event management strategy game the city behind the match is your playground.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Copa City - The Time Is Running Out Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
⚔️ Voidwrought Special Edition Descends on PS5 soon! 

Enter a hand-drawn world of cosmic horror, ancient gods, and divine decay. Voidwrought — the haunting 2D Metroidvania developed by Powersnake and published by Kwalee in collaboration with Selecta Play — is coming to PlayStation 5 in both Standard and Special physical editions.
Special Edition includes:
- Original Soundtrack CD
- Collector’s Box with exclusive artwork
- 1 metallic pin
- Embroidered patch
-  Set of 3 character magnets
Descend into the frozen ruins of the First Civilisation, face over 70 enemies and 11 epic bosses, and build your shrine to uncover the blood of the gods. With tight combat, atmospheric art, and a chilling soundtrack by Jouni Valjakka, Voidwrought offers an unforgettable cosmic adventure.

- Pre-order now and secure your copy before it’s gone!

#ps5 #ps5games #voidwrought
title: Voidwrought - Physical Edition Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Saddle up! The adventure begins today with Barbie, Barbie, and Lucky in Barbie Horse Trails! Ride, explore, and create your own journey in Canterbury Trails Park.

✨ Play as Barbie and Barbie alongside your horse, Lucky.
✨ Groom, feed, and accessorize Lucky with saddles, ribbons, and more.
✨ Explore an open world filled with forests, lakes, mountains, and wildflower fields.
✨ Train as a Junior Ranger and uncover wildlife discoveries.
✨ Meet friends like Ken, Teresa, Nikki, and Daisy as you complete missions and minigames.
Are you ready to gallop into adventure?
Start your journey today on PlayStation®!
#Barbie #BarbieHorseTrails

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #barbiehorsetrails
title: Barbie Horse Trails - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
